description.displayText: Emma has been our favorite sitter! She is very calm and did a great job playing with our toddler. Our little girl LOVED it when Emma came. She did a great job following our preferences, cleans up messes, prepares meals, and has great communication skills. She even went the extra mile to take our child swimming. We trusted her so much that she helped our toddler at our home birth in 2020. Love you Emma!
